extendedInfo.description: Compete against the most challenging, realistic opponents in a fun game of Championship Spades! Enjoy a fun, fast-paced game presented in soothing jewel tones and cheerful HD graphics, with helpful hints and charming characters. You set the pace, choose your challenge level, and your favorite variation. Sneak a few hands of Spades in throughout your day, or sit down and enjoy a full game.Created by a previous winner of the Spades Nationals in Las Vegas, Championship Spades has the most realistic competitive-level bots that will give even master Spades players a challenge!Don't take our word for it!  Reviews from our players:***** "Fun characters teach all levels.  Experts will appreciate the challenge!"***** "The opponents' play isn't predictable. It's like playing with real people!"***** "Bless you!  I sincerely appreciate that -- what great customer service!"A step-up from a lonely game of Solitaire, Championship Spades delivers a game with personality:+ Discover 9 amusing computer opponents to both challenge and entertain you+ Enjoy a sense of accomplishment as you (re)master Spades card play+ Easily play using taps, drag and drop, or our innovative zoom-n-play+ Sharpen your skills with Questie, our adorable in-game DreamCoachâ¢ dragon+ Improve your game with our HINTS as you learn not just what to play, but why+ Enjoy unlimited UNDOs and REPLAY hands until you perfect your play+ Explore in-game options that allow you to cheat in numerous ways and play exciting variationsEnjoy unlimited free Spades games with this interactive version of the classic card game Spades. Playing cards is simple and an intuitive menu system will let you explore a variety of game options. Easy enough for your inner child and engaging enough for your adult side. You'll enjoy joining our Player's Club to unlock advanced options that keep you engaged once you've mastered the free version.Universal app features HD graphics for Xoom and other hi-res tablet devices and newer Android phones running Honeycomb or Ice Cream Sandwich (3.x) as well as support for older Android phones running Froyo 2.2 or Gingerbread 2.3.For even more challenge, you can optionally upgrade to Player's Club to get these benefits:  * Practice - Sharpen your skills with Auto Hint, Play Suggested, Repass, Replay  * No Ads - Streamline game and remove in-house and third-party banner ads  * Cheats - Indulge your dark side with View cards, Redeal, Custom Hand, Illegal Plays, Playout Game  * More Variations - 6 new Spades game variations to learn and enjoy:     + Cutthroat - Three-player frenzy, no partner to cover you!     + Jokers - Partnership play with the addition of 2 Jokers     + Blinds - Blind bids and Nils without seeing your hand!     + Passing - Pass cards to save partner on Nils and Blinds     + Suicide - One player forced to bid Nil every hand     + Mirror - Player must bid Spades count every hand     + Insanity - Suicide + Blinds + Passing + Jokers all at once!     + Classic - Hold rotation for passing + Low Club lead     + Jacks - Bonus points for capturing Jack of Diamonds     + Team - Work with your partner for team scoring     + Spot - Value-based scoring vary with pips on card     + Gates - Bonus points for hitting exact score gates     + Reverse - It's all upside down!  * Masters Bots - Highest level of mastery (3 new characters - Chuckles, Sparky, Starla)  * Personalized Avatar - Put yourself into the game with camera or photo  * Custom Bot Creator - Create new, custom opponents.  Import photos and set styles  * Customization - 3 new custom table backgrounds and 3 new card decks to play with

reviews.title: Itz cool
reviews.comment: Nothing\'s perfect but I enjoy it..worth a try:-)
reviews.author: Tanya Nobblen

reviews.title: fatally flawed
reviews.comment: this game has a great  AI and lots of options if you\'re willing to pay the 15 dollars  (ouch). but even with all the options it\'s fatally flawed. there is no save/restore game feature.  the program takes over your full screen and if you receive a phone call or text while playing you cannot see, answer or respond without killing the game. the fact that you cannot at least pause game to do any other activity let alone save/restore and come back later renders this game useless. No refunds.
reviews.author: Steve Kelfer

reviews.title: spade game
reviews.comment: this game is the one i always choose for my spade game..awesome game.. on my computer I have da same game, but wid the options of passiing highest spade when bidding nil, need also the JOKERS,.
reviews.author: Memaw lil mama

reviews.title: Refund
reviews.comment: It wont let me play different games. It continues to freeze up. I would like a refund to purchase another game.
reviews.author: Clara Jones

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: The best Spades game out there. Played for years on Windows and now on my Sony Tablet. Works great.
reviews.author: Ricky Mensch

reviews.title: Myshawne
reviews.comment: Fun to play. Can\'t put it down. Need to do my homework. But I can\'t cut on the first trick but my partner and opponents can.Doesn\'t seem fair.
reviews.author: Myshawne Fogg

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: My partner needs to look at what I play.
reviews.author: wyldwildwest raymond

reviews.title: Three things I dislike in a game
reviews.comment: CAN\'T turn off the sound/music  CAN\'T have my spades on the end  HAVING to click twice  ...and  NO jokers!  Uninstalling for good...n I feel for the person buying this game especially if it costs $15.00 cause I wouldn\'t even pay two cents!
reviews.author: Di v\303\240 D\303\256vv\303\244
